subject: Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: The veterans Ángel Berroa and John Rodriguez will compete for a job as an extra outfielder with Shelley Duncan, who cleared waivers and was sent outright to Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre.
snippet: The veterans Ángel Berroa and John Rodriguez will compete for a job as an extra outfielder with Shelley Duncan, who cleared waivers and was sent outright to Class AAA Scranton/Wilkes-Barre.
